title: A Letter for John
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Malcolm Otton
brief_description: No. 2 in the Junior Social Studies series this film shows how John, a boy who lives in Bathurst, New South Wales, receives a letter through the post from his friend Peter, who lives in Manly, Sydney, New South Wales.
